# Setup and load libraries
```{r setup}
library(ggpubr)
library(patchwork)
library(ggforce)
library(ggdist)
library(gghalves)
library(ggbeeswarm)

theme_set(theme_bw())

scientific_10 <- function(x) {
  parse(text=gsub("e", " %*% 10^", scales::scientific_format()(x)))
}
```

# Read in data and format
```{r Load data and format}
data <- readxl::read_xlsx("../Data/Figure_S2_Analyze_size_aggregates_MeanOfEachField.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(Area=as.numeric(Area))
```

# Plot
```{r Plot}
ggplot(data, aes(y=Strain, x=Area)) + 
  ggdist::stat_halfeye(aes(fill=Strain), adjust = .6, width = .7, .width = 0, 
                       justification = -.2, point_colour = NA) +
  geom_beeswarm(aes(color=Strain), method = "center", cex=2.5, size = 1.3) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Strain), alpha=0.4, width = .2, outlier.shape = NA) + 
  scale_x_log10(label=scientific_10)+
  scale_fill_manual(values=c(PcLag43="dodgerblue", 
                             `Ag43_On`="darkgreen", `Ag2/Nb2`="orange",`Ag3/Nb3`="darkred"))+
  scale_color_manual(values=c(PcLag43="dodgerblue", 
                              `Ag43_On`="darkgreen", `Ag2/Nb2`="orange",`Ag3/Nb3`="darkred"))+
  theme(legend.position="none")

ggsave("../Figures/FigureS1_Aggregates_size.pdf", width=6, height=3.5)
ggsave("../Figures/FigureS1_Aggregates_size.png", width=6, height=3.5, dpi=600)


```

sessionInfo()
